ConversableAgent.description: An agent that can engage in conversations

AssistantAgent.description: A subclass of ConversableAgent with specific default settings for assistants

UserProxyAgent.description: A subclass of ConversableAgent that can represent a human user

GroupChat.description: A group chat environment for multiple agents

common_user_intents.make the agents talk to each other: Create a GroupChat with ConversableAgent instances and register them with a GroupChatManager
common_user_intents.connect them together: Establish communication protocol between agents using GroupChat
common_user_intents.work as a team: Configure collaborative agent framework using GroupChat and GroupChatManager
common_user_intents.coordinate activities: Implement coordination mechanisms through GroupChat speaker selection methods
common_user_intents.share information: Configure shared memory or communication channel through GroupChat
common_user_intents.learn from each other: Implement knowledge transfer protocols using message passing in GroupChat
